channel.title: More characters for username
channel.description: How can i change the max characters from the username in the [b]CLIENT[/b] from 12 to 100000?

item.title: More characters for username
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

Ahh, he fail-quoted, so I didn’t see it.

Anyway; let me get the non-refactored code.

I will update this post soon.

Read full topic

item.title: More characters for username
item.dc:creator: @pkkid pkkid
item.description:
@pkkid wrote:

[quote=“EmulousGuru, post:9, topic:365549”][quote author=staypuff link=topic=461750.msg3379997#msg3379997 date=1287949481]

how do you know it is possible if you don’ t know how to do it? ;D
yeah really, i don’ t think this is possible, sorry.
[/quote] non-refactored client

of course it’s possible. Java can handle way larger numbers. An example being a player having 2,000,000,000 gp (2billion)

It is just that this is such a stupid request that no one really cares or is willing to put even a minimal amount of effort into finding this.

Well, 32bits can process from -2147483647 to 2147483647, while 64bits can process from -9223372036854775807 to 9223372036854775807.

Though that would be pointless. You wouldn’t be able to see characters after the 18-21st character, so why would you need so many?

Are you making a cheat client?

Anyways, for the code; are you on a refactored, or non-refactored client?[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: More characters for username
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

[quote=“staypuff, post:8, topic:365549”][quote author=Sanskrit link=topic=461750.msg3378602#msg3378602 date=1287846805]
how do you know it is possible if you don’ t know how to do it? ;D
yeah really, i don’ t think this is possible, sorry.
[/quote]

of course it’s possible. Java can handle way larger numbers. An example being a player having 2,000,000,000 gp (2billion)

It is just that this is such a stupid request that no one really cares or is willing to put even a minimal amount of effort into finding this.[/quote]
Well, 32bits can process from -2147483647 to 2147483647, while 64bits can process from -9223372036854775807 to 9223372036854775807.

Though that would be pointless. You wouldn’t be able to see characters after the 18-21st character, so why would you need so many?

Are you making a cheat client?

Anyways, for the code; are you on a refactored, or non-refactored client?

Read full topic

item.title: More characters for username
item.dc:creator: @pkkid pkkid
item.description:
@pkkid wrote:

[quote="#Haste, post:4, topic:365549"][quote author=pkkid link=topic=461750.msg3378386#msg3378386 date=1287826359]

How can i change the max characters from the username in the CLIENT from 12 to 100000.

LOLWUT? You want 100K characters for your usernames? How an earth, would you mute or ban someone with 100k characters. Anyways, I doubt this is possible.

It is possible.
[/quote]

Explain how? And also why would you want a 100k character username? How would you ban, mute, jail, xteleto?[/quote]
I just ask how to change it…
If you don`t know how to do it why post?

Read full topic
